Text.Page:
Watch out for argon remnants both above and below. They creep back in here on a regular basis. Slaughter any you see on your way out.

On your way out? Yes. Report to Shadowspark Chamber. I know we've been bouncing you from chamber to chamber, but we're trying to stay one step ahead of the argons.
Every researcher says how you're not just protecting them, but aiding in some of the more dangerous aspects of our field work. So...could you do me a favor, too?
